forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Snow Showers then Chance Rain Showers
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow showers between 7am and 9am, then a chance of rain showers. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 44. Southwest wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Thursday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers likely. Mostly cloudy. Low around 35, with temperatures rising to around 37 overnight. West wind 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain Showers then Slight Chance Snow Showers
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 7am, then a slight chance of snow showers between 1pm and 4pm, then a slight chance of rain and snow showers. Partly sunny, with a high near 40. Northwest wind 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers likely. Mostly cloudy. Low around 33, with temperatures rising to around 36 overnight. West wind around 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%.

forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 7am. Partly sunny, with a high near 40. Northwest wind 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

nubsNob.comments: The Snow Crew turned the guns on last night. Despite some cold temperatures in the area the conditions at Nub's Nob allowed for only a few hours of quality snowmaking. The team is here around the clock, ready for the next opportunity. At this point it looks like there is a turn toward colder weather right around Thanksgiving. We will continue to update the blog to keep you up to date. Think COLD and SNOW.
